headline: Williams-Sonoma, Inc. declares quarterly cash dividend
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, December 17, 2025--Williams-Sonoma, Inc. (NYSE: WSM) announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.66 per share of common stock. Each stockholder of record as of the close of business on January 16, 2026 will be paid the cash dividend on February 20, 2026.

content.title: Williams-Sonoma, Inc. declares quarterly cash dividend

(NYSE: WSM) announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.66 per share of common stock. Each stockholder of record as of the close of business on January 16, 2026 will be paid the cash dividend on February 20, 2026.
